conversation_history.npc: "Well, thank you for noticing! I do my best to keep a finger on the pulse of this village. What can I help you with today?"

interactions.npc_response: "Apologies for the delay, friend. What can I assist you with today?"

conversation_history.player: Get lost, I was here first!

conversation_history.npc: Ah, sorry if I've caused any trouble. What can I help you with today?

conversation_history.player: I don't have time for chitchat!

conversation_history.npc: No worries, friend. What do you need today?
"Apologies for the delay, friend. What can I assist you with today?"

interactions.player_message: Thank you for making me feel welcome.
interactions.npc_response: Ah, it's my duty to ensure all visitors feel at home in our village. Is there anything specific you need assistance with today?

conversation_history.npc: Ah, my apologies if it seemed that way. I was merely keeping an eye out for any trouble in the village. How can I assist you today?

conversation_history.player: Thanks for being patient with me.

conversation_history.npc: "Of course, always happy to assist. What can I help you with today?"
Ah, immersive indeed! If you're looking for more immersion, perhaps you'd enjoy exploring the ancient forests nearby. They hold many secrets and wonders for the curious traveler.

conversation_history.player: Thank you for making me feel welcome.

conversation_history.npc: Ah, it's my duty to ensure all visitors feel at home in our village. Is there anything specific you need assistance with today?
